definitions.definition: A feeling of depression resulting from being alone or from having no companions .
The condition or state of being alone or having no companions.
The state of being unfrequented or devoid of human activity ( of a place or time ).
A desire to be alone; disposition to solitude .

main_definition: A feeling of depression resulting from being alone or from having no companions .
secondary_definitions: The condition or state of being alone or having no companions.
The state of being unfrequented or devoid of human activity ( of a place or time ).
( obsolete ) A desire to be alone; disposition to solitude .
